title: Bridge IT, Inc. operates hellobrigit website
statement: Bridge IT, Inc. operates the website located at www.hellobrigit.com and associated services.

citations.quote: Bridge IT, Inc., its parents, subsidiaries, partners, third-party service providers, affiliates, agents, and assigns ("Brigit", "we", "us", or "our") that sets forth the terms and conditions governing your use of and access to the website located at [www.hellobrigit.com]
